TugOfWarPDController Class Reference

This PD controller will try to track a desired trajectory of the block in the tug-of-war model. More...

Detailed Description

This PD controller will try to track a desired trajectory of the block in the tug-of-war model.

Constructor.

Parameters:
aModel Model to be controlled
aKp Position gain by which the position error will be multiplied
aKv Velocity gain by which the velocity error will be multiplied

int  index 
) const [inline, virtual]

This function is called at every time step for every actuator.

Parameters:
s Current state of the system
index Index of the current actuator whose control is being calculated
Returns:
Control value to be assigned to the current actuator at the current time
